casebody.data:
HERMES STEAM CONTROLLER CO., Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. NEW YORK STEAM CORPORATION and F. E. Pendleton, Defendants-Appellees. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 9, 1928. No. 94. Newell & Spencer, of New York City (E. E. Newell and George M. Dowe, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Ilowson & Ilowson, of New York City (Hubert Ilowson and Benjamin T. Eauber, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PEE CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
